name: Cytech Student Project - Metal Fear Not So Solid
name_original: Cytech Student Project - Metal Fear Not So Solid
description:
A Student Project by Rémi, Félix, Naël, Ragulan and Rayan at Cytech.

Your goal is simple, escape from each room by retrieving the key that unlocks the exit while paying attention to the guards.

You can play it on the page (and that's cool !!) but we recommend playing it by downloading the game for the best experience !
